languages.text: "Он не навредил мне". {n}Ткач смотрит на тело убитого со странным выражением.{/n} "Но он пытался. Так велела идея, которой он был предан до последнего вздоха. Он умер... правильно".

traits.locale_text: "Он не навредил мне". {n}Ткач смотрит на тело убитого со странным выражением.{/n} "Но он пытался. Так велела идея, которой он был предан до последнего вздоха. Он умер... правильно".

languages.text: "He did not harm me." {n}Kibellah looks at Nemesite's body with an incomprehensible expression.{/n} "But he tried. Such was his idea, and he remained committed to it until his last breath. His was... a good death."
languages.original_text: "Он не навредил мне". {n}Ткач смотрит на тело убитого со странным выражением.{/n} "Но он пытался. Так велела идея, которой он был предан до последнего вздоха. Он умер... правильно".

traits.locale_text: "He did not hurt me". {n}The weaver looks at the body with an incomprehensible expression.{/n} "But he was trying to. Such was his idea, and he remained committed to it until the last breath. It was... a good death."

"He did not hurt me". {n}The weaver looks at the body with an incomprehensible expression.{/n} "But he was trying to. Such was his idea, and he remained committed to it until the last breath. It was... a good death."

"He did not harm me." {n}The weaver looks at the body with an incomprehensible expression.{/n} "But he wanted to. Such was his idea, and he remained committed to it until his last breath. His was... a good death."

"He did not harm me." {n}The weaver looks at the body with an incomprehensible expression.{/n} "But he wanted to. Such was his idea, and he remained committed to it until his last breath. His was... a good death."

"He did not harm me." {n}Kibellah looks at Nemesite's body with an incomprehensible expression.{/n} "But he tried. Such was his idea, and he remained committed to it until his last breath. His was... a good death."

"He did not harm me." {n}Kibellah looks at Nemesite's body with an incomprehensible expression.{/n} "But he tried. Such was his idea, and he remained committed to it until his last breath. His was... a good death."

languages.text: "Er hat mir nichts getan." {n}Kibellah betrachtet Nemesits Leiche mit einem nicht deutbaren Ausdruck.{/n} "Aber er hat es versucht. So lautete seine Idee, und er ist ihr bis zu seinem letzten Atemzug gefolgt. Er ... hatte einen guten Tod."
languages.original_text: "He did not harm me." {n}Kibellah looks at Nemesite's body with an incomprehensible expression.{/n} "But he tried. Such was his idea, and he remained committed to it until his last breath. His was... a good death."

traits.locale_text: "Er hat mir nichts getan." {n}Kibellah betrachtet Nemesits Leiche mit einem nicht deutbaren Ausdruck.{/n} "Aber er hat es versucht. So lautete seine Idee, und er ist ihr bis zu seinem letzten Atemzug gefolgt. Er ... hatte einen guten Tod."

languages.text: «No me ha herido». {n}Kibellah observa el cuerpo de Nemesitio con una expresión incomprensible.{/n} «Pero lo ha intentado. Ese era su ideal, y se entregó a él por completo hasta su último aliento. La suya es... una buena muerte».
languages.original_text: "He did not harm me." {n}Kibellah looks at Nemesite's body with an incomprehensible expression.{/n} "But he tried. Such was his idea, and he remained committed to it until his last breath. His was... a good death."

traits.locale_text: «No me ha herido». {n}Kibellah observa el cuerpo de Nemesitio con una expresión incomprensible.{/n} «Pero lo ha intentado. Ese era su ideal, y se entregó a él por completo hasta su último aliento. La suya es... una buena muerte».

languages.text: 「奴の攻撃は当たらなかった」{n}キベラは理解できないという表情でネメサイトの亡骸を見つめる。{/n}「でも、奴は戦う姿勢だったわ。そういう思考で、最期のよ時までそれに執着し続けた。彼の死は…良い死だった」
languages.original_text: "He did not harm me." {n}Kibellah looks at Nemesite's body with an incomprehensible expression.{/n} "But he tried. Such was his idea, and he remained committed to it until his last breath. His was... a good death."

traits.locale_text: 「奴の攻撃は当たらなかった」{n}キベラは理解できないという表情でネメサイトの亡骸を見つめる。{/n}「でも、奴は戦う姿勢だったわ。そういう思考で、最期のよ時までそれに執着し続けた。彼の死は…良い死だった」

languages.text: “他并没有伤到我。”{n}绮贝菈看着涅墨斯特的尸体，脸上挂着令你难以理解的表情。{/n}“但他尝试过，这就是他的想法，而且他一直坚持到了生命的最后一刻。他……死得其所。”
languages.original_text: "He did not harm me." {n}Kibellah looks at Nemesite's body with an incomprehensible expression.{/n} "But he tried. Such was his idea, and he remained committed to it until his last breath. His was... a good death."

traits.locale_text: “他并没有伤到我。”{n}绮贝菈看着涅墨斯特的尸体，脸上挂着令你难以理解的表情。{/n}“但他尝试过，这就是他的想法，而且他一直坚持到了生命的最后一刻。他……死得其所。”

languages.text: « Il ne m'a fait aucun mal, {n}dit Kibellah en observant le corps de Némésite avec une expression indéchiffrable.{/n} Mais il a tenté de le faire. Telle était son intention et il n'y a jamais renoncé jusqu'à son dernier soupir. Il est mort... dignement. »
languages.original_text: "He did not harm me." {n}Kibellah looks at Nemesite's body with an incomprehensible expression.{/n} "But he tried. Such was his idea, and he remained committed to it until his last breath. His was... a good death."

traits.locale_text: « Il ne m'a fait aucun mal, {n}dit Kibellah en observant le corps de Némésite avec une expression indéchiffrable.{/n} Mais il a tenté de le faire. Telle était son intention et il n'y a jamais renoncé jusqu'à son dernier soupir. Il est mort... dignement. »

languages.text: "Bana zarar vermedi." {n}Kibellah, yüzünde anlaşılmaz bir ifadeyle Nemezit'in cesedine bakıyor.{/n} "Ancak zarar vermeye çalıştı. Fikri de buydu ve son nefesine kadar fikrine sadık kaldı. Onunki... İyi bir ölüm oldu."
languages.original_text: "He did not harm me." {n}Kibellah looks at Nemesite's body with an incomprehensible expression.{/n} "But he tried. Such was his idea, and he remained committed to it until his last breath. His was... a good death."
